response.original_title: Alyas Pusa - Ang Taong May 13 Muhay
response.overview: Alyas Pusa: Ang Taong May 13 Buhay is a 1988 Filipino action film directed by Pablo Santiago and starring Ramon Revilla, Alona Alegre, Angela Perez, Paquito Diaz, and Fred Moro. It employs Revilla's usual formula of having his character own a protective amulet in battle.
response.title: Alyas Pusa - Ang Taong May 13 Muhay
